properties.areaDesc: Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell; Jones; Southern Craven; Pamlico
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 3:46PM EST until February 21 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...WINTER STORM WILL BRING ACCUMULATING SNOWFALL TO THE AREA
TONIGHT INTO FRIDAY MORNING...

.Sleet and snow will begin to mix in with light to moderate rain
later this afternoon and this evening, gradually transitioning to
all snow by late tonight. Snow will be heavy at times overnight
with the highest snow totals across the northern half of Eastern
NC. Snow will taper off Friday morning, with gusty winds
continuing through the day.

* WHAT...Snow expected, heavy at times. Total snow accumulations
of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph near the
coast.

* WHERE...Tyrrell and Mainland Hyde Counties.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for North Carolina can be found online
at DriveNC.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY
